name: FPV Motocross Racing VR PRO - Full Stunts Version
name_original: FPV Motocross Racing VR PRO - Full Stunts Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

Rev the throttle and hang on in this adrenaline pumping, FPV Motocross bike racing game!

Overtake other off-road vehicles like trucks, dirt bikes and ATVs and hit ramps to go as far as you can. Earn money and upgrade your motorcycle bike. Buy new MX bikes. Race across a huge map in different endless stages both day and night. See how far you can ride!


Check out these cool features:

-12 stages in total. You will experience a lot of different environments, obstacles, and even some kick a$$ scenery!

-Tons of real dirt bikes. Not happy with the basic in stock version? No problem! You can choose from a variety of different bikes!

-Choose your own awesome colors! Customize everything you want.. choose the color that makes you want to rock!

-Upgrade your moto bikes! Lots of cool upgrades! Too many to list here!

- 6 different extreme game modes including police chase and an insane 2 way traffic mode!

- Multiple camera angles including FPV (in-Car/ on-bike view)! This 'First Person View' mode is the best thing to an actual VR game minus the headset!! Check out out!
